```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Chickwt Data-set


 
```{r}
#The mean for chicken weight in relashion with the feed 
kbl(chickwts %>% 
  group_by(feed) %>% 
  summarise(wightes_mean=mean(weight)))
```

```{r}
#The chicken weight range
kbl(chickwts %>%
  summarise(The_Weights_Range=range(chickwts$weight)))
```

## Including Plots

```{r feed, echo=FALSE}
plot (chickwts$feed)
```
